txt.en:
'My mother told me that you gathered supplies for the kelkka, we are so happy to have your help.

'I am actually a little frightened, too. A horrible wolverine jumped out at me while I was making my way around the lake! It was big and ugly...I thought for a moment it would surely swallow me whole.  

'Maybe I ask too much of you, Sivullinen, but if you could check along the north road for me and be sure the wolverines have not found something they are protecting, I would be able to walk the lakeshore without a care!'

'I knew they had found something, but something as nice as a bird's nest I would not have suspected.

'It was small you say? You must be a mighty hero indeed to mock such a menace!

'Thank you again. Tomorrow I will make haste for the shore.'
A wolverine jumped out at Mainio while he was out at the lake.

The snarling wolverine is on a lakeside cliff, off the north-west road from Kauppa-kohta.\n\nA snarling wolverine jumped out at Mainio and scared him. He asked you to investigate and make sure the wolverines are not a threat.
Mainio is at Kauppa-kohta, south of the road.\n\nYou should return with news of your success against the snarling wolverine.
